Please always provide the [GitHub issue(s)](../issues) your PR is for, as well as test URLs where your change can be observed (before and after):

Fix #<gh-issue-id>

Test URLs:
- Before: https://main--figma-to-eds--omnichannel-2024.hlx.live/
- After: https://<branch>--figma-to-eds--omnichannel-2024.hlx.live/
